name: Advanced Micro Devices
goal: For more than 45 years, AMD has driven innovation in high-performance computing, graphics, and visualization technologies -- the building blocks for gaming, immersive platforms, and the datacenter. Hundreds of millions of consumers, leading Fortune 500 businesses, and cutting-edge scientific research facilities around the world rely on AMD technology daily to improve how they live, work, and play. AMD employees around the world are focused on building great products that push the boundaries of what is possible.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Matters affecting procurement, the environment, security, trade, supply chain and corporate responsibility.

Specifically:
- Eco Design (Lot 3 (computers) and Lot 9 (enterprise servers)
- public procurement (Targeted consultation on the draft Guidance on Public Procurement of Innovation)
